text: Vit C Pro Brilliance Serum with Vitamin E & Jicama Extract

product_name: Lakme Vitamin C Brillance Serum with 10% Vit C Complex - 15 ml

product_specifications.how_to_apply: Cleanse with facewash AM or PMTreat with serum AM or PMMoisturize with Day Cream AM or PMProtect with SPF 50++++
product_specifications.ingredients: 10% Vit C+ Complex - with antioxidant powerJicama Extract - Helps smoothen skinVit E - Helps moisturize skinFull Ingredients List: 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Propanediol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pachyrhizus Erosus (Bengkoang) Root Extract
product_specifications.special_features: Elevate your skincare experience with the newly launched Vitamin C Pro Brilliance Serum, a breakthrough formulation designed to redefine your path to luminous skin.Crafted with a potent 10% Vitamin C Complex, this serum emerges as a powerhouse against oxidative stress, delivering the ultimate antioxidant-powered glow.Harnessing the natural brilliance of Vitamin C, Jicama Extract & Vitamin E, this serum is a testament to advanced skincare science.This allows you to experience the full spectrum of Vitamin C benefits, from brightening dark spots to promoting collagen synthesis for a firmer, more youthful complexion.The Vitamin C Pro Brilliance Serum is a versatile addition to your skincare routine, offering a multifaceted approach to address the impact of oxidative stress on your skin.Its antioxidant-rich formula works tirelessly to neutralize free radicals, the culprits behind premature aging and dullness.As a result, your skin is shielded from environmental aggressors, allowing you to revel in the confidence of a vibrant, healthy glow.The lightweight and easily absorbable texture of the serum ensures a seamless application, sinking into your skin to deliver its transformative benefits.Incorporate it into your daily ritual, applying a few drops onto cleansed skin, and watch as your complexion undergoes a radiant change.For best results, build your regime with the Lakme Vit C Brilliance Collection.
